name: Pac-Man: 25th Anniversary Edition
overview: This is an arcade machine with Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man and Galaga. The cabinet included an option for the operator to set the game to play the original versions or a sped-up version of Pac-Man or Ms. Pac-Man as well as a rapid-fire version of Galaga. The game was available in a standard coin-operated version and a version with no coin slot that was free-to-play that might have been used in, like, a home.
